question: Monthly income of Lisa is 102/71. Lisa used 41/71 of her monthly income to pay rent and 21/71 on groceries. How much of her income is left with Lisa now?
Alex and his sister both completed 58/67 and 52/67 respectively of their homework. How much of the homework did they complete together?
Jane used 16/24 of her monthly salary to pay bills. What is this fraction in simplest form?
Emma drank 71/98 of a glass of juice and her brother drank 17/98 of the same glass. How much juice was consumed in total?
Mike solved 90/95 of the maths problems correctly. What is this fraction in simplest form?
